name: Jerry The Slime
description:
Meet Jerry. He's a slime.

Jerry loves jumping, however, when he becomes a warrior, he can't jump anymore, so he turns into violence, being able to destroy whatever he wants, or rewind to his previous state and place. Even though he only wants to destroy some weird cracked doors...

Anyway, Jerry seems to be in some weird place. Who knows how he got there, Jerry always gets in trouble somehow. He has to make use of his abilities to solve some puzzles and get out of wherever he is now.

This game was made by alditto (Me) and MickyOr (https://itch.io/profile/mickyor), for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2. Special thanks to _s_e_r_, since he taught me pretty much everything I needed to be able to make this a thing. This was our first game jam, and even though the game isn't perfect, I'm happy for how it turned out to be.

CREDITS

The music used is from the "Tearjerker Music Pack" made by Tungerman (tungermanu@gmail.com | tungerman.itch.io | https://tungerman.itch.io/tearjerker-music-pack).


The character sprites were based on Jesse M.'s "Jungle Asset Pack" (https://jesse-m.itch.io/jungle-pack).

CONTROLS
Move: A and D keys/Arrow keys
Jump (Slime)/Attack (Warrior): SPACEBAR
Change to Slime/Warrior: SHIFT
